name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Engineer with 8 years of Full Stack Development experience, specializing in high-performance solutions tailored for the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Flutter**, **Node.js**, **Python**, **AWS**, and **GCP**, I leverage my skills to drive innovation and foster a builder mindset. My expertise encompasses full-stack engineering with modern frameworks like **React**, **Vue**, and **Next.js**, ensuring seamless integration and development of robust applications.

I have a solid background in developing scalable architectures utilizing microservices and event-driven systems, complemented by CI/CD automation. Committed to compliance and security, I have successfully led initiatives adhering to standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My entrepreneurial drive allows me to proactively seek out solutions, and I bring a hands-on approach to building and deploying machine learning pipelines and serving models in production, adeptly utilizing tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Node.js** and **Python** to architect and develop scalable full-stack healthcare and financial platforms, ensuring user-driven design and seamless integration of back-end services.
Employed **Flutter** and **Firebase** for delivering cross-platform mobile applications, achieving a seamless user experience across **iOS** and **Android** platforms while integrating native modules and state management solutions.
Fostered a builder mindset by implementing CI/CD pipelines with **Firebase** for automated testing, deployment, and monitoring of mobile applications to enhance performance and reliability.
Exercised an entrepreneurial drive by transforming monolithic applications into microservices architectures using **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for greater scalability and fault tolerance, resulting in improved application performance for 1000+ users.
Designed cloud-native data architectures using **AWS** and **GCP** services to support large-scale data ingestion and querying for healthcare and financial data, significantly enhancing operational efficiency.
Developed machine learning models in **Python** for applications like patient risk prediction and financial fraud detection, focusing on delivering actionable insights with integration into back-end services for real-time performance.
Constructed MLOps pipelines using **Apache Airflow** for continuous model training and deployment, facilitating minimal downtime and maintaining service continuity.
Integrated AI-powered features into client applications, enhancing user engagement with personalized recommendations and predictive alerts, directly impacting user satisfaction metrics.
Executed enterprise-level DevOps practices by employing **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, ensuring smooth code releases and adherence to security compliance for API services.
Delivered insightful financial data analytics tools using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, improving decision-making processes with clear visual representations of transaction trends for stakeholders.
Collaborated closely with data scientists to merge NLP technologies into healthcare applications, improving document processing efficiency by 35% through model integration via RESTful APIs.
Established robust testing strategies employing **Jest** and **Cypress**, ensuring high-quality code through unit, integration, and E2E testing for both front-end and back-end components.
Implemented advanced search capabilities across millions of healthcare records using **ElasticSearch** and **Azure Cognitive Search**, improving information retrieval efficiency within the response time of under 1 second.

Utilized **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to lead full-stack development projects, enhancing financial platforms with microservices-based architecture, resulting in improved scalability and maintainability for **9** high-volume transaction systems.
Demonstrated a builder mindset by creating dynamic, user-focused front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, implementing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver responsive user interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Engineered real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards leveraging **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, equipping operations teams with tools to track financial activity, leading to a **30%** reduction in anomaly detection time.
Integrated **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to lay the groundwork for a robust event-driven architecture, facilitating real-time event processing for transactions, alerts, and compliance workflows across **5** distinct services.
Constructed and orchestrated ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling efficient batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from up to **3** internal and third-party sources.
Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems employing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing up to **100,000** transaction patterns to proactively flag suspicious activities in banking systems.
Developed machine learning pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, seamlessly integrating model inference into backend services for real-time decision-making.

Demonstrated full-stack engineering by designing and optimizing backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Node.js** and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), ensuring high availability and low latency across key modules such as checkout and order fulfillment.

Utilized **AWS** and **GCP** infrastructure to deploy scalable applications, maintaining 99.9% uptime and handling over **1 million** transactions daily.

Engineered real-time features employing event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating efficient order updates and dynamic inventory tracking, which reduced operational latency by **30%**.

Developed intuitive frontend applications using **Flutter**, React (**18**), and Vue (**3**) to enhance user engagement, achieving a **40%** decrease in load times and mobile responsiveness.

Integrated and optimized **Firebase** as a backend service for real-time data syncing, improving customer interactions and application performance.

Implemented secure payment processes with **Stripe** and **PayPal**, ensuring PCI compliance and reducing transaction failure rates by **25%**.

Led feature flag management and blue-green deployments using **Kubernetes** namespaces, allowing controlled updates and A/B testing, reducing deployment risks by **50%**.

Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** to secure customer and admin data, ensuring compliance with GDPR and increasing data privacy standards in the system.

Fostered a builder mindset and entrepreneurial drive within the team, mentoring junior developers and driving innovation in the development lifecycle.
